flawed_nl_solution:
To treat his 20 dogs, Mr. Sean charged Khalil 20*$60 = $<<20*60=1200>>1200
Khalil also paid $40*60 = $<<40*60=4200>>4200 to Mr. Sean to treat his cats.
Altogether, Khalil paid Mr. Sean $4200+$1200 = $<<4200+1200=5400>>5400 to treat his pets.
#### 5400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2400, not 4200. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
